Name: Hold your holy cross firmly before the ghast and recite a banishment prayer!
Stand your ground. There is nothing to fear. God is on your side.
Move towards the iron gate at the far end of the room.
Text: You cross the decaying furniture to towards the gate.

Name: Try the key.
Text: The key fits and the gate opens with a slow heavy groan, the sound of its rusty hinges echos down the stairs. What do you do?
